act: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Power to raise loans by the issue of certificates.
type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Power to raise loans by the issue of certificates. 3. Wherever by any Act or resolution of the National Assembly authority is given to the Minister to raise any sum of money for the purposes mentioned in that Act or resolution, such sum or part thereof may be raised by the issue of certificates or bonds under this Act.
type.description: Wherever by any Act or resolution of the National Assembly authority is given to the Minister to raise any sum of money for the purposes mentioned in that Act or resolution, such sum or part thereof may be raised by the issue of certificates or bonds under this Act.

type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Applications for certificates and for the redemption of certificates. 4. An application for the purchase of a certificate or a bond or for the redemption thereof shall be made in such manner as the Minister may require.
type.description: An application for the purchase of a certificate or a bond or for the redemption thereof shall be made in such manner as the Minister may require.

act: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Form and denominations of certificates.
type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Form and denominations of certificates. 5. (1) Certificates or bonds shall be issued in such form and denominations and upon such terms and conditions as may be determined by the Minister.  (2) The provisions of section 22(8) and (9) of the Financial Administration and Audit Act, (which relate to the issue of a duplicate of a Treasury Bill defaced, lost or destroyed) and, save as otherwise provided by regulations made under this Act, any regulations   made   under   that   Act   for   the   purposes   of   those provisions mutatis mutandis apply to certificates.

act: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Moneys payable under Act to be part of public debt.
type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Moneys payable under Act to be part of public debt. 6. All moneys payable under this Act  in  respect  of  the interest or premium on certificates or bonds and all expenses of or incidental to the redemption of certificates or bonds shall be part of the public debt of Guyana within the meaning of article 221 of the Constitution.
type.description: All moneys payable under this Act  in  respect  of  the interest or premium on certificates or bonds and all expenses of or incidental to the redemption of certificates or bonds shall be part of the public debt of Guyana within the meaning of article 221 of the Constitution.

act: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Exemption from income tax and capital gains tax.
type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Exemption from income tax and capital gains tax. 8. The Minister may, by order, declare that in respect of any particular issue of certificates or bonds, no income tax or capital gains tax shall be chargeable on any interest or premium paid to the holder of any certificates or bonds or on any capital gains accruing to him by reason of any transaction in respect of them.   Provided that no order  under this section shall apply to  any amount in excess of ten thousand  dollars  in  respect  of  certificates or  bonds  held  by  any person.
type.description: The Minister may, by order, declare that in respect of any particular issue of certificates or bonds, no income tax or capital gains tax shall be chargeable on any interest or premium paid to the holder of any certificates or bonds or on any capital gains accruing to him by reason of any transaction in respect of them.   Provided that no order  under this section shall apply to  any amount in excess of ten thousand  dollars  in  respect  of  certificates or  bonds  held  by  any person.

type.description: Certificates or bonds shall be capable of being transferred by delivery, or in such other manner as may be prescribed by regulations made under this Act.

type.context: TREASURY SAVINGS CERTIFICATES AND SAVINGS BOND  ACT under Certain Acts not to apply to certificates or bonds. 10. The General Loan and Stock Act and the General Local Loan Act shall not apply to certificates or bonds.
